title: Chapter 1633 - This Is My Business
body:
Chapter 1633 - This Is My Business

The atmosphere was still and silent.

Su Yi said casually, “I’m a rogue cultivator accustomed to freedom. I won’t join any faction in this lifetime.”

Everyone in Blue Cliff Academy was instantly disappointed.

Over in Pine Hut College’s camp, the white-robed middle-aged man couldn’t help but say, “Were our conditions insufficient? How about this: if you have any other terms, please feel free to say them. We’ll agree to any request that’s within our power.”

Su Yi couldn’t help but laugh dryly. “I’ve already said my piece. You could offer me good fortune grand enough to carry me to the pinnacle of the Immortal Dao, and I still wouldn’t spare it so much as a single glance.”

Nie Weirui, the white-robed middle-aged man, and the others furrowed their brows.

Over in Blue Cliff Academy’s camp, despite their disappointment, they saw that Su Yi’s mind was made up, and they made no further attempts to persuade him.

Old Monster Zhao Yunfeng laughed. “Everyone has different ambitions. Blue Cliff Academy naturally won’t push you. Regardless, you overcame the Blue Cliff Twelve Towers. According to the rules, we ought to reward you generously.”

“That’s right....
